receiveELRewards().details: We need a dedicated function because funds received by the default payable function are treated as a user deposit

receiveELRewards().notice: A payable function supposed to be called only by LidoExecLayerRewardsVault contract

documentation.text:
Emitted when the ERC20 `token` recovered (i.e. transferred)
 to the Lido treasury address by `requestedBy` sender.

Emitted when the ERC721-compatible `token` (NFT) recovered (i.e. transferred)
 to the Lido treasury address by `requestedBy` sender.
Emitted when the vault received ETH

@notice Allows the contract to receive ETH
 @dev execution layer rewards may be sent as plain ETH transfers
@title A vault for temporary storage of execution layer rewards (MEV and tx priority fee)
